commentary: Sollux has eye lasers, like Cyclops from the X-Men. Nepeta has Wolverine claws. There are a lot of comic book hero things going on with the troll powers. I think this is obvious enough that it barely warrants mention, but here I am mentioning it, because someone bought ink by the barrel and gave the barrels to me to splash around with for 500 pages. Speaking of Nepeta, the narrative has decided we've endured enough hardship that we should be steeled sufficiently to withstand the secondhand embarrassment of getting to know this cute furry character. So let's get to know her, all right?
